dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SUSE Rancher with TrilioVault for Kubernetes and AWS S3 - Getting Started

productname: SUSE Rancher, Trilio TrilioVault for Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services (AWS) S3

personname.surname: Ayres, Public Cloud Solution Architect, SUSE

abstract.para: SUSE Rancher simplifies deployment and management of rich, cloud native application landscapes. With Trilio's TrilioVault for Kubernetes and Amazon Web Services (AWS) S3 storage, organizations gain application-centric backup, disaster recovery, application mobility, and attack mitigation capabilities that help ensure business continuity.
